repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:xenial 
MAINTAINER atomney <atomney+docker@gmail.com> 

RUN apt-get update -q && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -qy software-properties-common && \
add-apt-repository ppa:deluge-team/ppa && \
apt-get update -q && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -qy deluged deluge-web nano htop && \
apt-get autoclean && \
apt-get autoremove && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN mkdir -p /data && mkdir -p /downloads 

COPY core.conf /data/core.conf 
COPY web.conf /data/web.conf 

ADD start.sh /start.sh 

VOLUME ["/data", "/downloads"] 

# Torrent port 
EXPOSE 53160 53160/udp 

# WebUI 
EXPOSE 8112 
# Daemon 
EXPOSE 58846 
CMD ["/start.sh"]
